text:
Laughter and Fury

A crowded cart, drunken peasants laughing.  
The mare struggles under the weight.  
Mikolka: “Get in, all of you!”  
Young man: “She’ll draw you all!”  
Crowd: “Look at that poor nag!”  

---

A boy watches, horrified.  
His father pulls him back.  
Boy: “Father, they’re beating her!”  
Father: “It’s just fun, come away!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** A drunken crowd cruelly forces a struggling mare to pull a heavy cart while laughing at her plight.
